archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.2.1a: a) identifying the information risks associated with target environments (i.e. assessing the criticality of information, potential business impacts, level of threats and identified vulnerabilities (e.g. security control weaknesses))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
